name: Knaller
description:
The great competition where all is about bombs!

Four fighters enter an epic fight. Plant bombs, disrupt walls, collect bonuses and beat your enemies.

Explore the map

Follow the story of a girl and boy fighting for their home. Whether it's in the city, marsh, cemetery or library: every landscape offers an unique challenge. Succeed in the temple and face the General.

Play battle

Measure your strengths fighting several opponents. Invite one friend to cooperate or compete to finally find out who is the ultimate hero.
